## ColorTransform.amount property

The amount of transformation. For saturate/desaturate/lighten/darken: -1.0 to +1.0 For rotate: degrees (can be any number) For fade: 0.0 (fully opaque) to 1.0 (fully transparent/faded)

**Signature:**

```typescript
amount: number;
```
